parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Plural
str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Darkness; fig: spiritual darkness. From skotos; dimness, obscurity.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Light, a source of light, radiance. From an obsolete phao; luminousness.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A store-chamber, secret chamber, closet; a granary, barn.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To proclaim, herald, preach. Of uncertain affinity; to herald, especially divine truth.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
The roof (of a house), the top of the house. From demo; properly, an edifice, i.e. a roof.
